attributes.action: The creation of a Government Regulator for the control of petrol and diesel prices
attributes.additional_details:
There is an urgent necessity to appoint a government regulator for the control of petrol and diesel prices.

Why do we have regulators for gas and electricity but none for vehicle fuel which is vital for our economy?

Other petitions put forward on this issue to date are pointless unless there is a government mechanism to control the pricing of this life blood of the economy.
